programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2 - Ups Worldport

programme.title: Building The Impossible - Panama Canal

programme.title: Building The Impossible - Hoover Dam

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - Celebrating Lantern Festival In Beijing
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in his mum's home town of Beijing to begin a culinary, historical and personal journey through the ancient country of China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - The Simple Life In Anhui
programme.desc: Adam visits the beautiful, mountainous province of Anhui, home to one of the eight great regional cuisines of China. Anhui cuisine is hearty, peasant food that uses seasonal, wild produce from the mountains.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP9

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP10
programme.desc: Over the many years of colonisation America has burrowed their fare from the immigrants that settled here. Now there is a cuisine called 'American' and it’s delicious.

programme.title: Terri
programme.desc: Terri is an often bullied, overweight teen. When he decides to stop trying in school, the garrulous principal, Fitzgerald, becomes concerned. However, what was meant to be a counselling course for Terri becomes a journey of healing for both protagonists.

programme.title: Room 514
programme.desc: When Anna, a young, idealistic Israeli military investigator, confronts an elite officer with accusations of unnecessary violence against a Palestinian man in the Occupied Territories, her integrity and determination are challenged.

programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dubé is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.

programme.title: The Last Harvest
programme.desc: Traumatized policeman Ben delves into his own past to investigate a cold case obscured by a web of guilt, lies and deception. In the process, Marion, a doctor, helps him come to terms with himself and his past.

programme.title: Zurich
programme.desc: Nina roams the highways of Europe in a desperate attempt to forget her past. She decides to join a German driver on his journey, but it becomes clear that Nina’s behaviour stems from her pain due to a past betrayal.

programme.title: Karnaval
programme.desc: Alis, a 36-year-old, who lives in his car after being kicked out from his parent’s house, finds himself selling carpet cleaners. Through the “Karnaval” brand of carpet cleaners, he meets Demet, an ambitious wedding cake maker.

programme.title: Man And A Baby
programme.desc: Dad (Antti) is left alone with a newborn after the mom (Pia) decides motherhood is not her thing. Single dad tries to survive alone in "women's world" and keep the baby and himself alive.

programme.title: Khutulun: The Wrestling Princess
programme.desc: Princess Khutulun, a formidable Mongol warrior descended from Genghis Khan, has her marriage ambushed by an assassin who steals the Golden Sutra. Vowing revenge, Khutulun and her clan set out on an epic journey to retrieve the sacred text and restore peace.

programme.title: Just Like A Woman
programme.desc: Two women travel from Chicago to Santa Fe to escape their suffocating lives. Marilyn dreams of winning a contest held by a famous belly dancing company, while her friend, Mona, has a darker secret.

programme.title: Hunters On A White Field
programme.desc: Deep in the Swedish woods, three friends go on an extended weekend hunting trip. After an initial spell of success, the animals suddenly vanish without a trace. Despite being in a forest without animals, the men decide that the hunt must continue.

programme.title: One Floor Below
programme.desc: After being the sole unfortunate witness to a domestic quarrel that ends up in a murder, Patrascu finds himself at odds with two very close neighbours: one is the bizarre murderer. The other is his very own conscience.

programme.title: The Girl With Nine Wigs
programme.desc: Sophie has just started her studies, but her life is turned upside down when she is diagnosed with cancer. However, her lust for life drives her to break free from her illness, and she does so with nine wigs, each bringing out an aspect of herself.

programme.title: Unsinkable
programme.desc: In 1981, the newly built and unsinkable rescue boat RF2 sinks on an early mission, killing nine. Henrik, son of the captain blamed for the disaster, must investigate amidst resistance from fishermen fearing job losses and authorities dreading scandal.

programme.title: Murder In Haute Provence
programme.desc: Two police officers investigate a body found in a slaughterhouse with the label “Can they suffer”. Although an animal rights association was initially suspected, details reveal that the victim was an undercover cop specialising in veterinary surveillance.

programme.title: Nick-Off Duty
programme.desc: When Lenny sets off on a mission to avenge her mother’s murder, she finds herself in trouble with the Russian mob and an underground organ harvesting ring. Her father, Hamburg cop Nick and his partner must race against the clock to rescue her.

programme.title: GOLD 905 LIVE! with Mike & Vernetta - 29th November 2024
programme.desc: If you want a morning show that's all-out, vigorously, eye-popping fun and jollification to wake up you with a resounding thwack in the head, then make sure you tune in to LIVE! with Mike & Vernetta! The only morning show with comedic skits, improv games, interactive games with You and journeys into a radio, TV and movie realm you've never experienced before! Join us for a different theme every day, with something for everyone!
